weekly_top_story.headline: Trump threatens tariffs and military action to acquire Greenland from Denmark
weekly_top_story.summary: President Trump has escalated demands for U.S. control of Greenland, threatening tariffs on Denmark and NATO allies while refusing to rule out force, raising fears of a new geopolitical flashpoint in the Arctic amid competition with Russia and China.

stories.headline: Trump threatens to invoke Insurrection Act to deploy military to Minnesota amid ICE shooting protests
stories.summary: Following two fatal ICE-involved shootings in Minneapolis sparking clashes, President Trump is considering invoking the Insurrection Act to send U.S. troops, potentially escalating domestic tensions over immigration enforcement.

stories.headline: Barcelona train crash kills 1, injures 37 passengers days after another deadly collision in Spain
stories.summary: A train derailment in Barcelona has left one dead and dozens injured, highlighting ongoing safety concerns in Europe's rail networks shortly after a similar fatal incident.
